overview.en: CryptoTask (CTASK) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. CryptoTask has a current supply of 15,400,000 with 1,573,347.75520093 in circulation. The last known price of CryptoTask is 1.29507969 USD and is up 23.86 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 3 active market(s) with $485,267.81 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.cryptotask.org.
